messages.title: Wherever you go in Brent Dawn is making a difference
messages.content: Dawn is known by lots of local people because, as one of Brent's MPs over the last five years, she has been tirelessly working with residents about the issues that matter to them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Led a campaign to re-build the Crest Academies (John Kelly Boys School) and to prevent a council u-turn on their promise to the area.
Worked with Rt Hon Hilary Benn and Mapesbury Residents Association to preserve the Mapesbury Conservation Area and to prevent large buildings from being built without consultation.
Campaigned for £1m to help refurbish the Learie Constantine Centre.
Following extensive lobbying from Dawn Butler, Cardinal Hinsley School will benefit from the Labour government as part of the Building Schools for the Future programme.

mentions.candidate: Dawn is known by lots of local people because, as one of Brent's MPs over the last five years, she has been tirelessly working with residents about the issues that matter to them.

issues.education: Led a campaign to re-build the Crest Academies (John Kelly Boys School) and to prevent a council u-turn on their promise to the area. Following extensive lobbying from Dawn Butler, Cardinal Hinsley School will benefit from the Labour government as part of the Building Schools for the Future programme.
issues.environment: Worked with Rt Hon Hilary Benn and Mapesbury Residents Association to preserve the Mapesbury Conservation Area and to prevent large buildings from being built without consultation.
issues.governance: Campaigned for £1m to help refurbish the Learie Constantine Centre. Led a successful Safer Stations campaign.

housing.content: Dawn successfully postpones Brent Cross Cricklewood redevelopment plans.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud of this area. This is my home and I will do my best for Brent.

quotes.text: I'm proud of this area. This is my home and I will do my best for Brent.

images.caption: Wherever you go in Brent Dawn is making a difference
